item.title: Sony Interactive Entertainment announces preliminary TGS 2025 lineup
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5

Ghost of Yotei, MARVEL Tokon: Fighting Souls, and more.

Sony Interactive Entertainment has opened its Tokyo Game Show 2025 website and announced its preliminary games lineup for the event, which will run from September 25 to 28 at Makuhari Messe in Chiba, Japan.

Its lineup of playable games includes:

  • Main Booth
    • Ghost of Yotei (PS5)
    • MARVEL Tokon: Fighting Souls (PS5, PC)
  • Family Game Park
    • ASTRO BOT (PS5)

The full list of playable titles, schedule for stage events, details on how to reserve a playtime in advance, and merchandise information will be announced at a later date. Stage events will be live streamed on YouTube.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/sony-interactive-entertainment-announces-preliminary-tgs-2025-lineup

item.title: Onimusha: Way of the Sword – Gamescom 2025 demo playthrough
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

10 minutes of footage.

Capcom has released a 10-minute playthrough video of the Onimusha: Way of the Sword demo shown at Gamescom 2025 last week. The same demo will be featured at PAX West 2025 in Seattle, Washington from August 29 to September 1.

The video description reads, “Musashi heads to the iconic Kiyomizu-dera to investigate the appearance of Malice in the area, but a whole legion of Genma await him as well as a familiar face to him.”

Onimusha: Way of the Sword is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam in 2026.

Watch the footage below.

Event Demo Playthrough

Gameplay Techniques

  • 0:00 – Intro
  • 1:09 – Block from any angle
  • 1:49 – Melee (Break enemy’s guard)
  • 2:02 – Deflect
  • 2:25 – Parry
  • 4:43 – Oni Armament
  • 5:54 – Stealth Attack
  • 6:12 – Issen
  • 8:15 – Perfect Evade
  • 8:34 – Blade Dance
  • 8:41 – Break Issen
  • 9:10 – Blaze State


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/onimusha-way-of-the-sword-gamescom-2025-demo-playthrough
